tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RegulatoryComplianceDocuments (
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  document_name VARCHAR(100),
  document_content TEXT,
  submission_date DATE,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_documents (
  doc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  body_id INT,
  document_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  document_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  document_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_bodies_documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(255),
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_content TEXT,
    regulatory_body_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_bodies (
    regulatory_body_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulatory_body_name VARCHAR(100),
    regulatory_body_type VARCHAR(50),
    regulatory_body_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_checks (
    check_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    check_name VARCHAR(100),
    check_description TEXT,
    regulatory_body_id INT,
    document_id INT,
    check_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_documents (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    document_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    upload_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    body_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (body_id) REFERENCES regulatory_bodies(id)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_documents (
    doc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    body TEXT NOT NULL,
    doc_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    regulatory_body_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (regulatory_body_id) REFERENCES regulatory_bodies(id)
);

CREATE TABLE audit_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_date DATE NOT NULL,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    compliance_document_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (compliance_document_id) REFERENCES compliance_documents(doc_id)
);

CREATE TABLE auditor_assignments (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    auditor_id INT,
    audit_record_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (auditor_id) REFERENCES auditors(auditor_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (audit_record_id) REFERENCES audit_records(record_id)
);
